Package com.forsteri.unlimitedfluidity.core.fluidbehaviors.flammable

Interface IFlammableBehavior

All Superinterfaces:
IFluidBehavior, IInteraction, IInteractionBehavior, IInteractionWithNeighborBlockUpdate, IInteractionWithNeighborBlockUpdateBehavior
All Known Implementing Classes:
FlammableBehaviorImpl
public interface IFlammableBehavior extends IInteractionWithNeighborBlockUpdateBehavior

Api for creating fluid behavior making fluid flammable

This is a interface for FlammableBehaviorImpl for allowance of further extending

Since:
2.0

      Getting the object's flammability,

      require IFluidBehavior.requireBlockBeBehaviorable() to be true

      Specified by:
      getFlammability in interface IFluidBehavior
      Returns:
      Chance that fire will spread and consume this block, 300 being a 100% chance, 0, being a 0% chance.
